dict.acceptation: 热情的，强烈的，紧张的；热烈的，热情的，认真的；[摄]（底片）明暗度强的；有强烈感情（或意见、想法）的；

sent.orig: The negative intense emotion is the university student's catalyst of the intense emotional criminal offence.
sent.trans: 消极的激情是消极情绪的积累，是形成大学生激情犯罪行为的催化剂。

sent.orig: Red is an intense colour which generates intense emotions.
sent.trans: 红色是一种热情同时又会导致紧张情绪的颜色。

sent.orig: He felt intense happiness when he knew that he would attend the famous university.
sent.trans: 知道自己将上这所名牌大学，他感到非常幸福。

sent.orig: Advanced analysis and high-performance computing in structural engineering are now subjects of intense research interest.
sent.trans: 结构工程中高级的分析和高性能的计算现在成为大量研究的对象。

sent.orig: My father was an intense, emotional, rather quick-tempered man-more of an artist than an engineer.
sent.trans: 我父亲是一个热情认真，好动感情、有点性急的人，他更象一个艺术家而不象工程师。
